organic.title: Game Updates|Monster Hunter Wilds Official Online Manual
organic.snippet: By updating the game, you will always have access to the latest new game elements and features, so it's recommended you always make sure you have the latest version. Additionally, you must be updated to the latest version of the game in order to use online multiplayer. How to Update.
